description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. On a barely inhabited world, some villages have just been founded, seeding civilization. You are one of the villages' hero.  Can you ensure your people's survival? Will you lead them to world domination?  Pioneer is part role playing game, part strategy game.
description.short: On a barely inhabited world, some villages have just been founded, seeding civilization. You are one of the villages' hero.  Can you ensure your people's survival? Will you lead them to world domination?  Pioneer is part role playing game, part strategy game.
